text: Prepare to dedicate your days to cleaning and feeding your Tamagotchi because the original toy version is coming back! Japanese toy maker Bandai re-released its iconic electronic pocket... ...... read full story
title: The Original Tamagotchi Is Back, So Prepare to Never Get Any Work Done Ever Again
